##About

This app calculates the probability of each gender getting admitted into a specific department at UC Berkeley. A random six departments from UC Berkeley is loaded that you may select from. The data is from the datasets package ("UCBAdmissions"") from Cran.

##Manual
Select one field from "Gender" and one field from "Department." The app will calculate the probability of you getting into that specific department based upon your gender.
